description:
Get ready to get cozy. And we mean real cozy. Because this cool, tapered sweatpant for men was made from one of our fan fave fabrics, and once you've tried it, there's no going back.

Let us explain... These loungey bottoms allow you to enjoy that well-loved, pre-broken-in feeling from wear number one. We're not kidding. Made from bestselling Cardiff fabric—with naturally bacteria resistant hemp—this style makes everyday outfitting easy.
name: Prana Cardiff Fleece Sweatpants, 30" Inseam - Mens
